g.text: Just deleted 47 listings and I feel FREE! My shop already looks so
much cleaner. The ones left are actually my best work.
This is EXACTLY what's supposed to happen! Your shop can finally
breathe. Watch what happens to your views this week — the algorithm
Week 2 check-in: Already seeing traffic increase on my remaining
listings! The DELETE phase actually works. My views are up 34%
and I literally have FEWER products.
Question for everyone — when you did the SEO framework on your
listings, did you change all of them at once or spread it out over a
few days? I'm trying to figure out the best approach for my shop...
